name: Clicker Quest (jam version)
description:
A 1-bit color beat-matching clicker RPG game, originally created for the 1-bit Clicker Jam.

There is an updated and extended version here.

Experimented with most of the things, and of course ran out of time so had to cut features, graphics and content.

How to play

You have to go from place to place, beating the enemies you encounter. When attacking or defending your skill improves and after a while your skill will level up and will give you bonuses. You will allso gain experience points from beating the enemy, gathering enough will give bonuses on all your skills. Clicking on the beat will give you multiplier - it does not matter where you click, just click.

The game has no ending yet and there are a lot of features that are in development, will upload an updated after the compo version.

Should work in most modern browsers and with modern devices. Tested on Chrome, Firefox, Safari.

Credits

Gabor Heja (@gheja_), Zsolt Heja (@hejazs)
